main.name: Heather Rosa
main.description: Full Stack Web Developer - Back-end specialty
main.bio: To obtain a professional position in a full-stack, database management, or software development industry. To utilize my relevant technical experience, skills, and genuine enjoyment of problem solving to fix real world problems and help real people.
main.contactmessage: I embrace all opportunities to learn and put what I have learned into use. To find out if my skills can help your projects grow, please contact me using any of the means below.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Data Structures/Algorithms, Software Security, Java/C/Python, Machine Learning, Computation Analysis. Department GPA: 3.37

work.company: US Fish and Wildlife Forensics Laboratory
work.title: Full Stack Application Developer
work.description: Continued development on React, Node.js, Express, T-Sql stack application end-to-end project. Complete CRUD functionality. Material UI. NPM imports. Database architecture and file handling for uploaded attachments through RESTful API.

work.title: QA Internship
work.description: Responsible for testing payroll software for a fortune 500 company which included: code review of Excel macros, functional review of Excel spreadsheets, SQL relational database data integrity testing, report generation, code and functional review of multiple SSIS ETL packages, React front-end UX testing and validation.
